text: Anton Zeilinger (; born 20 May 1945) is an Austrian quantum physicist. Zeilinger is a professor at University of Vienna and at the Austrian Academy of Sciences. His works focused on quantum entanglement. He won the 2022 Nobel Prize in Physics with Alain Aspect and John Clauser. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2011. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Wolf Prize winners Category:Austrian physicists Category:Austrian Nobel Prize winners Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Anton Zeilinger
